company_name: The Union (International Union Against Tuberculosis and Lung Disease)
description: Junior Field Officers positions at The Union for implementing TB screening project using handheld X-ray machines in Delhi. Responsibilities include overseeing screening activities, managing operations at project sites, overseeing community mobilization, coordinating with X-ray technicians, liaising with NTEP officials, ensuring quality data collection and management, and supporting active TB case-finding activities. Requires postgraduate degree in Health/Social Work with 1-3 years experience in public health sector.

Data Science Specialist position supporting data science initiatives of the Department of Health and Family Welfare, Uttar Pradesh. Responsibilities include developing end-to-end data science projects, collaborating with vendors to implement large-scale data science products for public health, managing complete lifecycle of data science products, knowledge dissemination, and mentoring junior team members. Requires master's degree in Data Science/Computer Science and 3-5 years experience in machine learning and deep learning.
function: Data Analysis, Data Analytics, Data Management

description: Consultant position for Program Monitoring & Evaluation supporting Quality Improvement and Assurance Initiatives among Private Sector Maternity Hospitals. Responsibilities include drafting evaluation protocols, data collection tools, supporting M&E functions, documentation of project results, developing success stories and fact sheets. Requires Bachelor's in health and Master's in epidemiology/statistics/public health with 5 years experience in evaluation and research. Must have existing publications in international peer-reviewed journals.
